name: Francine!
wishText: Wishing you all the best in life kasi alam kong deserve mo yun!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I'm so glad that I met you!
replayText: mag iingat ka palagi ha? mwaaaaa!! <3
